name: VZMacOSInstaller
desc: An object you use to install macOS on the specified virtual machine.

items.name: var progress: Progress
items.desc: A progress object that you can use to observe or cancel an installation.

items.name: var restoreImageURL: URL
items.desc: The restore image URL used to initialize this installer.

items.name: var virtualMachine: VZVirtualMachine
items.desc: The virtual machine used to initialize this installer.
